high_descs: Turn to the right and the right again and walk around to the coffee table.
Pick up the remote from the coffee table.
Turn to the right and locate the lamp in the corner of the room.
Use the remote to turn on the lamp.
go to the coffee table in the living room
grab the remote control on the coffee table
head over to the lamp in the corner of the room
turn on the lamp in the corner of the room
anns.task_desc: turn on the lamp while holding a remote controller

high_descs: Turn and walk around to the other side of the coffee table, turning again to face it
Pick up the remote nearest the keys from the coffee table
Turn around and walk up to the floor lamp in the corner
anns.task_desc: Examine the remote under the light of the floor lamp
